Sentencas: Anode-supported solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) have attracted much attention in recent years because of their lower operating temperature.
Titulo: Simple and rapid preparation of Ce0.9Gd0.1O1.95 electrolyte films for anode-supported solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: For the preparation of anode-supported SOFCs, one of the key steps is the production of dense electrolyte films on the porous anode substrate.
Titulo: Simple and rapid preparation of Ce0.9Gd0.1O1.95 electrolyte films for anode-supported solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: In this study, Ce0.9Gd0.1O1.95 (GDC) electrolyte films with the thickness range of 1-75 mu m are successfully prepared on porous NiO-GDC substrates by simple, rapid and cost-effective methods: dry co-pressing method and spray dry co-pressing method.
Titulo: Simple and rapid preparation of Ce0.9Gd0.1O1.95 electrolyte films for anode-supported solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The open porosity of the NiO-GDC substrates is approximately 23%, and the porosity including closed pores of the GDC electrolyte films is less than 2.6%.
Titulo: Simple and rapid preparation of Ce0.9Gd0.1O1.95 electrolyte films for anode-supported solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The prepared GDC electrolyte films are homogenous, dense and well adhered to the porous NiO-GDC substrates, without cracks and connecting pores observed.
Titulo: Simple and rapid preparation of Ce0.9Gd0.1O1.95 electrolyte films for anode-supported solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The results of helium gas permeability tests show that the prepared GDC electrolyte films are gas-tight.
Titulo: Simple and rapid preparation of Ce0.9Gd0.1O1.95 electrolyte films for anode-supported solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Therefore, it is expected that the developed method for thin electrolyte films provides a simple and useful technique for producing electrolytes for anode-supported SOFCs.
Titulo: Simple and rapid preparation of Ce0.9Gd0.1O1.95 electrolyte films for anode-supported solid oxide fuel cells
Simple and rapid preparation of Ce0.9Gd0.1O1.95 electrolyte films for anode-supported solid oxide fuel cells
